Uses of Class
se.oidc.nimbus.usermessage.UserMessage

Packages that use UserMessage
Package
Description
se.oidc.nimbus.signrequest
Nimbus extensions for the OIDC Sweden specification Signature Extension for OpenID Connect.
se.oidc.nimbus.usermessage
Support for the Client Provided User Message request parameter as defined in section 2.1 of Authentication Request Parameter Extensions for the Swedish OpenID Connect Profile.
